summary.para: Gets the number of dimensions in which the animation variable has a transition specified.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

summary.para: Gets the duration of the transition.

param.name: duration
param.para: The duration of the transition, in seconds.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

remarks.para: An application should typically call the method before calling this method.
This method should not be called when the storyboard to which the transition has been added is scheduled or playing.

summary.para: Determines whether the duration of a transition is known.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

remarks.para: This method should not be called when the storyboard to which the transition has been added is scheduled or playing.

summary.para: Sets the initial value of the transition.

param.name: value
param.para: The initial value for the transition.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

remarks.para: Do not call this method after the transition has been added to a storyboard.

summary.para: Sets the initial value of the transition for each specified dimension in the animation variable.

param.name: value
param.para: A vector (of size cDimension) that contains the initial values for the transition.

param.name: cDimension
param.para: The number of dimensions that require transition values. This parameter specifies the number of values listed in value.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

remarks.para: The animation manager should not call this method after the transition has been added to a storyboard.

summary.para: Sets the initial velocity of the transition for each specified dimension in the animation variable.

param.name: velocity
param.para: A vector (of size cDimension) that contains the initial velocities for the transition.

param.name: cDimension
param.para: The number of dimensions that require transition velocities. This parameter specifies the number of values listed in velocity.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

summary.para: Sets the initial velocity of the transition.

param.name: velocity
param.para: The initial velocity for the transition.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise an HRESULT error code. See Windows Animation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

summary.para: Extends the interface that defines a transition. An IUIAnimationTransition2 transition determines how an animation variable changes over time in a given dimension.
